overview: Vincent Salinger, an edgy uninspired poet, fumes at being spurned by his publisher. Suspecting his work and life mean nothing, Vincent seeks new inspiration. An unexpected visit from quasi-demonic friend of poetry introduces Vincent to a clever East-European escort girl who thinks up a literary hoax for success but at the risk of Vincent losing his integrity and identity. Things become more complicated when a rival muse falls in love with Vincent and Vincent's hoax suddenly materializes to haunt him.
tagline: Vincent Salinger, uninspired poet, seeks inspiration from two muses who think up a literary hoax. Things go wrong when his fake poet hoax materializes and comes to haunt him.
title: Salinger's Two Dark Muses
